title: Entha Desathil Desthil Lyrics Priyamana Thozhi
stanzas:
Entha Desathil Desthil Song Lyrics Priyamana Thozhi
#SARajKumar #Hariharan

Entha desathil desthil
nee pirandhaai
ad ithanai perazha (2)

endhan swasathil swasathil
nee kalandhaai, ini
nee indri naan azhagaa

edho oru maattram
ennil ennil
yeno idai yaettram
yaettram idhayam thannil

nee kaal mulaitha pushpam
kadal nurayil
seitha sirppam
un munbu vandhu nindraal
andha sorgam kooda arpam
entha desathil ..

vanna vanna
poovelllaam vaasam
veesi poo pookkum
unnai pola ondrukkum
vaasaam veesaa theriyadhe

kodi kodi vaarthaigal
korthu kondu vandhaalum
nee sinungum oasai pola
artham edhilum
kidayaadhe..

o ..
Azhagae nee vaai pesa
geetham enbaene
sangeetham enbaenae

pesaatha mounathai
kavidhai enbaene
pudhu kavidhai
enbaene

kadal oram
veeyum vandhaal
puyal vandhadhendru
artham.

nee ennai neengi
sendraal
uyir nindradhendru
artham..
entha desathil ..

undhan kangal orathil
theetti vaitha
mai thandhaal
aindhu alladhainnooru
kaappiyangal
uruvaagum

undhan koondhal eerathai
thottu pona kaattraithaan
konja neram swasithaal
endhan vazhvil varamaagum.

o.o..
anbae un idhalaithaan
siraigal enbaene
pani siraigal enbaene

melithaana idaiyaithaan
piraigal enbaene
thaeip piraigal enbaene

adi anna paravai ondru
andru vazhndhadhaaga kaetten
naan kaetta andha ondrai
indru kangalaale paarthen.

Entha desathil desthil
nee pirandhaai
ad ithanai perazha (2)

endhan swasathil swasathil
nee kalandhaai, ini
nee indri naan azhagaa

edho oru maattram
ennil ennil
yeno idai yaettram
yaettram idhayam thannil

nee kaal mulaitha pushpam
kadal nurayil
seitha sirppam
un munbu vandhu nindraal
andha sorgam kooda arpam
